======Sets marine flashlight======
= Description =

Marine has flaslight to see aliens more easily in dark area. Flashlight can be turned on forever if [[asw_marine_flashlight.wiki|asw_marine_flashlight]] has set '1',  also Flashlight can be turned on forever until marine pick up a flashlight on ground if [[asw_marine_flashlight.wiki|asw_marine_flashlight]] has set '2'
